00033 //Based on device type and energy budget Tx-Options will be selected.
00034 BEGIN_PACK
00035 typedef struct PACK
00036 {
00037   uint8_t   performCsma   :1;
00038   uint8_t   requireMacAck :1;
00040   uint8_t   reserved :6;
00041 } ZGPD_TxOptions_t;
00042 END_PACK

00046 typedef struct _ZGP_Dataconf_t
00047 {
00048   ZGP_Status_t status;
00049   uint8_t handle;
00050 }ZGP_DataConf_t;
00051 END_PACK

00054 typedef struct _ZGP_DataReq_t
00055 {
00057 
00058     ZGP_Service_t service;
00061     //bool action;

00072     void (*ZGP_DataConf)(ZGP_DataConf_t *conf);
00074     ZGP_DataConf_t confirm;
00075 }ZGP_DataReq_t;
00076 
00077 BEGIN_PACK
00079 typedef struct _ZGP_Packet_t
00080 {
00081     uint8_t header[ZGP_MAX_ASDU_OFFSET];
00082     uint8_t payload[ZGP_MAX_ASDU_SIZE];
00083     uint8_t footer[ZGP_MAX_AFFIX_LENGTH - ZGP_MAX_ASDU_OFFSET];
00084 }ZGP_Packet_t;

00093 typedef enum _ZGP_DataInd_Status_t
00094 {
00095     ZGP_SECURITY_SUCCESS,  
00096     ZGP_NO_SECURITY,
00097     ZGP_COUNTER_FAILURE,
00098     ZGP_AYTH_FAILURE,

00124 }ZGP_DataInd_t;
